name: lambda-typescript-build
description: TypeScript build setup for Lambda function

scripts.test: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Build test passed')"
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.validate: if [ -f lambda_function.zip ]; then echo '✅ Package created: lambda_function.zip' && echo 'Contents:' && unzip -l lambda_function.zip; else echo '❌ Build failed: lambda_function.zip not found' && exit 1; fi
